self_predictions.prediction_summary: Ibragim feels confident in his ability to press and believes his speed will be an advantage. He acknowledges Chance's strength but thinks his own technique will prevail.

Chance Shaw.previous_match_summary: Chance is difficult to turn inside and has strong pronation.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Ibragim thinks if Morozov gets inside, he wins 90%, but getting there is tough. Overall, he finds it hard to predict due to respect for both athletes.

Vitalii Laletin.previous_match_summary: Vitalii is fast and has a huge, strong hand.

Artyom Morozov.previous_match_summary: Morozov is strong inside but struggles to get there against top rollers.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Ibragim thinks Todd will win but Krassi might take a round. He acknowledges Krassi's improvement but sees Todd as stronger.

Krasimir Kostadinov.previous_match_summary: Krassi is gaining strength but may not be at Todd's level.

Travis Bagent.previous_match_summary: Travis is coming back but may not be at his peak yet.

Bozhidar Simeonov.previous_match_summary: Bozhidar won at the World Combat Games.

self_predictions.prediction_summary: Chance feels healthy and confident but acknowledges Ibragim's strength. He plans to avoid hooking and focus on controlling the match from the outside.

Ibragim Sagov.previous_match_summary: Ibragim is difficult to turn inside and has a strong press.
